"A possibly metallic tool-type object, matte silver with angular grooves. Inconclusive evidence for its exact function, but it may be a wrench or specialized clamp. Seen in a workshop environment near assembly parts and other tools."

"A possibly glass vase-type object with translucent amber coloring. Fluted body shape and water droplets on surface. Likely floral display container. Found on windowsill with plants and pruning shears nearby."

"A possibly plastic container-type object, light blue with rounded edges. The tapered rim suggests it could be a lid or part of a larger storage unit. Functional affordances are unclear. Located in a room with furniture and a person seated nearby."
